titleStmt.title: Some observations made upon the Bermudas berries, imported from the Indies shewing their admirable virtues in curing the green-sickness / written by a doctor of physick in the countrey to the Honourable Esquire, Boyle.
titleStmt.author: Trapham, Thomas, d. 1692?
Peachi, John, fl. 1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Trapham by Halkett and Laing, 1926, although previously attributed to John Pechey by Surgeon general's catalogue (ser. 1) and British Museum Catalogue. cf. NUC pre-1956.
